tika.dc.description:
Canada' s favourite drink bible is back to help you make your holidays something to remember with quintessential holiday cocktails.

This well-priced and handy guide will help you master winter favourites like Eggnog, Kir Royale, and Brandy Alexander, and more, and also includes layering instructions and a guide to bar ware.

Mulligan' s Bar Guide: Holiday Cocktails is the perfect bar accessory from Canada' s first name in bartending.
